title.rendered: Apply Now | Red Deer College Programs4

content.rendered:
Red Deer College Programs Admission Requirements, English Language Proficiency Test, Application fees, How to apply.

Red Deer College Admission is ongoing for interested students who wish to apply for admission; the admission is open for all nationals:

Red Deer College Admission Requirements.

All applicants must understand the RDC’s English Language aptitude necessities

  • Applicants whose first language is not English must demonstrate English language proficiency for admission to credit programs by providing official credentials to the office of the Registrar at international .admission@rdc.ab.ca or by regular mail, after an online application has been submitted.
  • Certain RDC programs have unique English Language Proficiency Requirements; ensure you review the requirements for your desired program.
  • Applicants must as well meet all other program admission requirements including the English Course and a minimum percentage grade required for the program.

Method 1 | SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF ONE OF THE RECOGNIZED ENGLISH LANGUAGE PROFICIENCY TESTS

International applicants may demonstrate their English Language Proficiency by completing one of the recognized English Language Proficiency Tests described in the table below through achievements of the minimum required scores.

Method to Demonstrate English Language Proficiency ( ELP) Credentials Required to Verify  
Completion of the  English Language Proficiency Test as follows: Test results mailed or emailed directly to the Office of the Registrar at international.admission@rdc.ab.ca

 

 

Program TOEFL (overall score) IELTS* Academic (overall score)

RDC will continue to accept IELTS Indicator where IELTS is not available in person.

Method 2 | COMPLETION OF ENGLISH LANGUAGE ARTS 30-1 OR EQUIVALENT WITH A MINIMUM GRADE OF 60% 

International applicants may demonstrate their English Language Proficiency by providing proof that they have accomplished English Language Arts 30-1 or equivalent with a maximum percentage grade of 60%.

Method to Demonstrate ELP Documentation Required to Verify  
Completion of English Language Arts 30-1 or equivalent with a bare minimum of 60%. Authorized transcripts.

 

Steps on how to apply to Red Deer College

  • Click here and fill in the appropriate information
  • Click on submit and wait for the next information

 

Red Deer College Admission Application Fees:

  • For Domestic student: $120 non-refundable
  • International student: $150 non-refundable (CDN funds)

Note: the application fee is good for one academic year.

When to Apply

Term Month Day
Fall October 1
Winter April 1
Spring August 1
Summer September 1
